name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Senior Solutions Engineer with 8 years of experience, I excel in **Python** development for data analysis, **AI** analytics, and integration of **digital twin** technologies. My technical expertise includes hands-on experience with **GIS** for geographic data processing, ensuring high-quality client engagement through effective project management and communication. I have successfully translated complex requirements into high-performance solutions across healthcare and financial sectors, demonstrating strong problem-solving skills.
In addition to my core capabilities, I leverage my full-stack development skills using **React**, **Node.js**, and **Django**, along with deep cloud experience on **Azure** and **AWS**. I have led the development of enterprise-level platforms that encompass predictive analytics and intelligent automation, applying a strong foundation in microservices architecture and CI/CD processes. My experience extends to implementing machine learning pipelines and MLOps workflows, utilizing tools such as **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**.
